symboling.description: Its assigned insurance risk rating, A value of +3 indicates that the auto is risky, -3 that it is probably pretty safe.

value_dict.2: Assigned insurance risk rating of 2, indicating medium risk.
value_dict.1: Assigned insurance risk rating of 1, indicating lower than average risk.
value_dict.0: Assigned insurance risk rating of 0, indicating average risk.
value_dict.-1: Assigned insurance risk rating of -1, indicating lower than average risk.
value_dict.3: Assigned insurance risk rating of 3, indicating high risk.
value_dict.-2: Assigned insurance risk rating of -2, indicating very low risk.

normalized-losses.description: The average loss payment per insured vehicle year. This value is normalized for all autos within a particular size classification (two-door small, station wagons, sports/speciality, etc…)

wheel-base.description: The distance between the centers of the front and rear wheels, measured in inches.

length.description: Length of the car, measured in inches.

width.description: Width of the car, measured in inches.

height.description: Height of the car, measured in inches.

curb-weight.description: The weight of a car without occupants or baggage, measured in pounds.

engine-size.description: The size of the engine, measured in cubic inches.

bore.description: The diameter of each cylinder in the engine, measured in inches.

stroke.description: The distance the piston travels in the cylinder, measured in inches.

compression-ratio.description: The ratio of the volume of compression chamber at its largest capacity to its smallest capacity.

peak-rpm.description: The maximum RPM (Rotations Per Minute) of the car engine.

city-mpg.description: The fuel efficiency in city driving, measured in miles per gallon (mpg).

highway-mpg.description: The fuel efficiency in highway driving, measured in miles per gallon (mpg).

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in automobile pricing.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the automobile, please predict the price.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in automobile fuel efficiency.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the automobile, please predict the city miles per gallon.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted city miles per gallon is ______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in automobile fuel efficiency.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the automobile, please predict the highway miles per gallon.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted highway miles per gallon is ______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in automobile performance.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the automobile, please predict the horsepower.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in automobile specifications.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the automobile, please predict the curb weight.
